name: Reservation System
author: Irfan

sections.description:
Reservation System plugin easy to use your event registration. Reservation system working for post types single page file just use shortcode editor area or you want to add single file specific area, also reservation result as a calendar its show all reservation result current post. Event form have some basic fields, event name and event detail, also add some fields as personal information user name , email, and phone number.

Demo Link Click Here

Major features in Reservation System include:

  • Automatically checks event its already post specific date or same post id its shown you already reserve.
  • If you haven’t reserve event calendar will not appear.
  • No need to user registration and login system.
  • Reservation entry specific post type, show all event reservation on behalf of post.
  • Use date picker ui jquery.

PS: You’ll need shortcode [reservation_form] to use it for form, also need calendar shortcode [reservation_result] show reservation result;
sections.installation:
How to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload reservation system to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory OR Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Place Shortcode in your single page.
